summary: Alextrastrasza follower based on MxR's player character
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffd966][size=3][b]What happened?[/b][/size][/color]



[img]http://i.imgur.com/aNJ5MhD.jpg[/img]

News:
This is an updated version, to see what happened to the old version scroll to the bottom of this page.
[color=#ffd966][size=5][b]

Description:[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Custom class:[/size][/color]
- Shadow warrior

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Leveling:[/size][/color]
- Level with player ( 8- 100 )

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Custom ability / spell:[/size][/color]
- Alexstrasza will use customised healing spell to heal you if you or her health drop below 60%.
- She can summon Ysera for 60 second to aid her fight.

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Weapon:[/size][/color]
- Unique sword, bow and arrow

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Outfit:[/size][/color]
- Her armor is in her inventory, when you first meet her she will be wearing a casual dress. Once she follow you she will use the armor in her inventory so it is easier for you to make her whatever armor you want.

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Location:[/size][/color] Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn

Yes you can marry her.

( see sticky post for more details about her spells and weapon )

[youtube]AW8oHxdiGqY[/youtube]
Video made by Angelisye. Thank you  :)

[youtube]JoAHJy_5UgM[/youtube]



[b][color=#ffd966][size=5]Requirement:[/size][/color][/b]

UNP standalone version only require latest Skyrim

7bUNP HDT version require compatible skeleton, HDT physics and HDT bounce
( optional file in download section: install this file if the skin of 7bUNP version is too shiny. NMM user, download, allow overwrite. )

CBBE HDT version require compatible skeleton, HDT physics and HDT bounce

Recommended:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]xp32 maximum skeleton extended[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT physics extension[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast and Butt physics[/url]

[color=#ffd966][b][size=5]Installation:[/size][/b][/color]
Any mod manager or manual install as you prefer

[b][color=#ffd966][size=5]Update her:[/size][/color][/b]
There is no script in this mod so you should be ok just to let it overwrite if you have the old version installed. But the best practice is take all the things you given her, dismiss her, kick her out of your house, detach her from any follower overhaul mod etc etc. Uninstall, then install new version.

[size=5][b][color=#ffd966]Credit:[/color][/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE body by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP body by Dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii skyhair by apachii[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27060/?]Demon Hunter armor by BloodFree[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG texture by HelloSanta[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Texture by HHaleyy[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63635/?]China dress by zzjay[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?]Sotteta armor by Deserter X[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71633/?]The Witcher 3 Weaponry by Oaristys[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3083/?]Zelda Rupee Coins by LoganZezima[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60660/?]Engraved bow by Farinelli[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Women of skyrim face texture by zzjay[/url]
SG Hair
Natilde and zzjay for their excellent tutorials.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56463/?]Seraphim ( 7bUNP ) body by AlphineYJ[/url]

My apology if I forgot to mention anyone, please let me know.

[color=#ffd966][size=5][b]Permission note:[/b][/size][/color]

Do not reupload this mod to any other site.
Copyright of assets used in this mod belong to their creator / author as listed in the credit section.

This is what happened to the old version to this mod:
Ok guys I am not sure what happened. I uploaded a new UNP version just now to the old mod of this follower, then error message told me a file
with same name already existed and ask me to change the name. But on the field form it showing old file name. Click some button I think it was
like to see all my files to check, saw the new file plus the 3 old files but the new file is in white letters ( not like a normal link in file  download section ). Went to ' Manage my files section ), it says I have  no files uploaded? Check again the whole mod missing in Nexus ( wth ),  so here I am uploading the mod again and with the new version ( ver 2.1  ).
author: Ben
